channel.title: eCafeChat – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: eCafeChat: Posting Scrap Becomes Faster
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: Scrapbook is one of the most popular features on eCafeChat and a personal favorite of mine. For me, scrapping is the basic way to be in touch with my friends. Now sending and replying a scrap has become much more easier and faster. There is no need to go to the scrapbook of your friend … Continue reading eCafeChat: Posting Scrap Becomes Faster →

item.title: eCafeChat: New Features…
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: Last month I updated eCafeChat and added a lots of new features for improved and better user experience. Below is a quick tour of all of our new features on eCafeChat: Profile Visitors Now every user can know who are visiting their profile. After all, aren’t you curious who is taking an interest in you, … Continue reading eCafeChat: New Features… →

item.title: The Next Step…
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: If you’ve been on eCafeChat for more than a year, you might remember you could only have one photoâ€”your profile picture. Before that, we didn’t have the scrapbook, just a private message of text. And also, we didn’t have forums, banks, news, etc. Maybe if you were here really early on, you might remember a … Continue reading The Next Step… →

item.title: Welcome To eCafeChat Blog…
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: When I tell people I am working for eCafeChat, they want to know more; why we made changes, what we’re doing next, what the people are like. We’re starting a blog so everyone can get a close-up view of what we’re doing every day to make eCafeChat happen. We’ll update it regularly, with different people … Continue reading Welcome To eCafeChat Blog… →
